sql.where:
p.delete_flag=0 and p.store_id=#{storeId}
and p.name like #{nameLike}

mapper.select:
select p.id,p.name,p.base_price,p.category_id,p.designer_id,c.name categoryName,d.name designerName from sale_product p left join sys_product_category c on c.id=p.category_id left join sale_store_designer d on d.id=p.designer_id
order by p.id desc

select p.id, p.store_id, p.category_id,p.designer_id, p.name, p.base_price, p.portrait, p.carousel, p.html_content,c.point_rate basePointRate from sale_product p left join sys_product_category c on c.id = p.category_id
where p.id =#{id}
